titles.title: Medicare Prescription Drug Savings and Choice Act of 2011
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to deliver a meaningful benefit and lower prescription drug prices under the Medicare program.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1561)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary: 3/10/2011--Introduced. Medicare Prescription Drug Savings and Choice Act of 2011 - Amends part D (Voluntary Prescription Drug Benefit Program) of title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide for: (1) establishment of one or more Medicare operated prescription drug plan options; and (2) an appeals process for denials of benefits under a Medicare operated prescription drug plan.
